thread.title: Emmerdale spoilers: Aaron's copped it again when he gets arrested by the police
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: Aaron's copped it again when he gets arrested by the police

author: Neil Batey
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Aaron's copped it again when he gets arrested by the police
text:
There's trouble for Aaron, a comeuppance for Finn and pain for Paddy (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It’s an eventful week for Aaron, who inadvertently sabotages his own wedding plans and ends up getting his collar felt by the law again. 
The Livesy lad is still irritated by the amount of time Robert is spending with his ex-girlfriend, Rebecca. Chas warns Aaron about his green-eyed monster antics, but when was the last time the mechanic heeded his mum’s advice? That’ll be never. 
Aaron later tells Finn that he and Robert have decided to get married in Las Vegas. But his insecurities flare up again when Finn reveals that Rob has been out with Rebecca all morning. In a hot-headed fury, he angrily confronts the ex-lovers as they’re having a cosy drink together. 
Realising their relationship has serious trust issues, Aaron and Rob hold crisis talks at The Woolpack. But they’re interrupted when the cops arrive to talk to him. What’s he done this time? Stalk of the town Nathan, Kasim and Finn (Photo: ITV) 
In this week’s instalment of Looks Who’s Stalking, lovesick creep Finn finally gets his comeuppance... 
Stooping to new lows in his quest to win back Kasim, he offers male escort Nathan cash to accompany him on a fake date to try to make Kasim jealous. 
It backfires when Kasim realises Finn is paying the strapping lad and drives off – with Finn giving chase in a cab. Finally, there’s a climactic clash in the street as Kasim shoves Finn and says he’s crazy. Harsh but true. 
Aaron beats up Kasim leaving Finn gutted knowing the man of his dreams blames him for being attacked. Date's a sore point Paddy and Chas (Photo: ITV) 
Paddy realises love hurts when he suffers an agonising injury to his private parts on a date with Chas. 
The unlucky-in-love vet is still pining for Chas, but reckons their will-they-won’t-they relationship is cursed. Frankly, he might be right. 
Marlon sets them up on another romantic night out, but Paddy hurts his unmentionables while getting dressed. He sits through the awkward date with a cushion shielding his crotch. Desperate to numb the pain of his injury, Paddy necks too much wine and Chas is shocked when he passes out.
